content.text: The Koala Mercenaries are a trio of bodyguards who watch over Rain Dinners.
Not much is known about their personalities, it can be assumed that they are loyal to Crocodile since he is their boss.
As bodyguards, they must surely be powerful enough to ensure their role. Nevertheless, they were easily defeated by Luffy.
When Luffy rushed through Rain Dinners to find Crocodile, they tried to stop him from rushing in but they were defeated easily.

elements.text: â†‘  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 78), the group name revealed.
